doc.description: Parkings without park_ride information but close (400m) to stations without P+R parking.
doc.why_problem: Parkings not tagged as P+R could result in a detour to another P+R parking when performing intermodal routing.
doc.how_to_fix: Check on the ground if the potential parking is really a P+R parking and tag with either park_ride=yes or park_ride=no.
